name: Robot Shot
description:
Welcome to the future, earthling. The earth is beautiful in the future. Tall skyscrapers reach for the skies and flowers fill the fields of the countryside. Well, that's what it used to be like! Alien robots have come to earth to invade our planet. Explosions and chaos are happening every minute. No one seems to be worthy of stopping them. Except you. Jump into your spaceship and save the universe!

Robot shot is a retro type shooting game that allows the player to experience by being the hero to save the world from destruction! The controls are simple. Use the arrow keys to move around and press the space bar to shoot. But the controls may be easy but defeating the robots is a fun challenge. We hope you enjoy our game!

Don't forget to try some of our other games too!

Bug bam: https://cybrog.itch.io/bug-bam
